easy.title: The More You Take
easy.question: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

medium.title: The Truthful Twins
medium.question: You meet two twins: one always tells the truth, the other always lies. You can ask one question to one twin to find the door to safety. What do you ask?
medium.answer: Ask either twin: 'If I asked your twin which door leads to safety, what would they say?' Then take the opposite door.
